SummaryEnglish:
An infamous yakuza sets out to master the Way of the Househusband!
“The Immortal Dragon”—an infamous and feared yakuza who has left behind countless legends in the underworld—has decided to wash his hands of his dark past and become...a “househusband”!
Under the watchful eye of the neighborhood, the yakuza, and the police, witness this gangster-turned-husband’s style of “justice and family love.” A thrilling slapstick drama where the ultimate househusband faces struggles from every side!
Can Tatsu protect his beloved family and neighborhood when they are caught up in an incident?
Aliases: 極主夫道 テレビドラマ

0.TitleEnglish: 極主夫道～３年辰組 極主夫先生

7.SummaryEnglish: About a year and a half after the final episode of the drama, Ryu (Hiroshi Tamaki) and Miku (Haruna Kawaguchi) are thrown into chaos when their daughter Himawari (Tamaki Shiratori), who is now in junior high school, brings her boyfriend! ), Hibari (Izumi Inamori) and the rest of the Tenjakukai are in chaos over Miyabi's (Jun Shison) job hunting! A battle erupts! Policeman Sakai (Yudai Furukawa) and the women's association make a big fuss at the venue of the crime prevention workshop! We will tell you the charm of the characters of "The Way of the Househusband", such as the beginning of getting used to it and the reunion with Miyabi!

1.TitleEnglish: The Legendary Gangster Devotes His Life To Household Chores!
1.SummaryEnglish:
Tatsu (Hiroshi Tamaki) was once a legendary gangster called the "Immortal Dragon", washed his feet and now lives peacefully with his wife Miku (Haruna Kawaguchi) and daughter Himawari. He lives a busy life as a "housekeeper" who puts his life into housework. 

On the other hand, the Tenjakukai, to which Tatsu was belonged, under pressure from rival Oshiroyama-gumi. With the power of the current Tenjakukai, it is unlikely that it will beat the Oshiroyama group.

Tatsu's former brother, Masa (Jun Shison), begs to return to the group. However, Tatsu refuses, saying, "I have become a stay-at-home husband." Meanwhile, an incident occurs in which the tension between the Tenjakukai and the Oshiroyama group further increases. The dragon who witnessed the gracious people being cornered cannot be left alone

2.SummaryEnglish:
Tatsu (Hiroshi Tamaki) reunites with his former rival Torajiro (Kenichi Takito). Torajiro, known as the "Gouken Tiger," was a legendary gangster who doubled as a dragon, but now he is released from prison and sells crepes. The dragon and Torajiro glared at each other and scattered sparks. 

Meanwhile, Tatsu joins the fitness club at the invitation of Tanaka, the chairman of the Fire Dragon Town Women's Association. There, Tatsu is introduced to Tanaka by Yamamoto, the chairman of the Mizuryu Town Women's Association in the neighboring town. Hiryucho and Suiryucho were supposed to open a store at an upcoming festival, but a trouble occurred between the Hiryucho Women's Association and the Suiryucho Women's Association over this event. 

The Immortal Dragon is also involved in the conflict between the women's associations.

3.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Husband Joins the PTA!?
3.SummaryEnglish:
When Tatsu (Hiroshi Tamaki) was watching TV, Senkinraku, the chairman of PTA of Himawari's School, appeared as the "ideal father". Tatsu, who wanted to be his ideal father, attend a PTA meeting and told Senkinraku that he wanted to join the PTA. 

At the meeting, they were discussing the upcoming Halloween Party. Tatsu declares that he will cooperate with the party. But the Immortal Dragon has no idea what Halloween is like. Tatsu asks Masa (Jun Shison) for help, but Masa is not familiar with Halloween either. So, Masa decided to ask Yukari (Tina Tamashiro) to teach him.

4.TitleEnglish: A Parental Mess!? Immortal Catch & A Couple's Marriage Secret
4.SummaryEnglish: Miku (Haruna Kawaguchi)'s parents visit the family. Tatsu (Hiroshi Tamaki) welcomes Miku's mother and father. However, Miku's father seems to be frightened by the Immortal Dragon. Tatsu is asked by Miku's father to do something unexpected. Meanwhile, Miku is entrusted with a big job at the company. It was decided that Miku's design would be adopted at a painting exhibition. Miku decides to draw a design for a painting exhibition and present it in-house. She works until the morning of the presentation to draw the design. After Miku goes to work, Tatsu notices that Miku has forgotten the design drawing. Tatsu heads to her company to deliver the design drawings,

6.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Husband's Apprentice! Spartan Training!

7.TitleEnglish: Geek Love Explosion! A Big Blunder on a Rainy Day!

8.TitleEnglish: Desperate! Attacked by the Sweets Gang!

9.TitleEnglish: Finally the Climax! My Beloved Daughter Dissapears...A Family in Crisis!?
